documentType: Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and official out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 30-31, 2019. It records inmate population counts by housing unit and lists specific inmates scheduled for out-counts (temporary removal from their units) for various assignments, including one for Jeffrey Epstein.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC)
locations.address: 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: Federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein and other listed inmates were held. The location for all the count sheets and rosters.

locations.name: New York, New York
locations.context: City where the Metropolitan Correctional Center is located.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's inmate register number is recorded as 76318-054, and he was housed in unit Z04-206LAD at the MCC.
On July 31, 2019, Epstein was scheduled for an 'ATTY' out-count, indicating he was to be removed from his housing unit for an attorney visit.
The documents show routine Bureau of Prisons administrative procedures (population counts and out-counts) at the MCC in the days surrounding Epstein's death.
The total inmate population at the MCC on these dates was approximately 760 individuals.
Many other inmates are listed with various work assignments (commissary, food service, transport) and out-count reasons.
